Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, 's <MYNAME>. What you up to?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Awful early for you to be up 'n about. You're a
real go-getter, ain'tcha? ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mornin' is just the start of it all. You work hard
from the first ray of sun to the last an' good
things'll come your way, sure as sugar! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Had lunch yet?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You pack lunch today?
<PAGE>
If you're gonna be on the job all day, you should
always carry somethin' to eat with you.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm just about to make everybody's lunches.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But I swear, every single person's got different
tastes, so figurin' out what to make 'em is like a
puzzle ya can't really solve...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hang in there, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Awful late for you to be workin' so hard. You
should go home an' take it easy! Don't wanna
catch a cold from overexertion, now, do ya?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Best be careful. Work till the wee hours o' the
mornin' and you might find yourself oversleepin'!
<RED>∀</RED>

Content.VardId: 天気・季節ＭＳＧ（会話フラグOFFでしゃべる）
Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Everything's all pink an' pretty outside. I do so
love this time of year!
<PAGE>
Best season of 'em all, if you ask me. Just look
at a shower of cherry blossoms and tell me it
don't move your heart strings! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Cherry blossoms are bloomin' all around, but I'm
worried that this rain might scatter 'em.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Though cherry blossoms scatterin' look real
pretty too, I guess! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, sure is swelterin' today... Hope it rains a
little an' cools this place down!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Rain cools the air right down. Feels good, don't
it? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Best season of the bunch, ain't it? ♪
Mountain looks like it's burnin', what with all
them red leaves.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't these fall rains just give you a romantic
feelin' in your heart?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If I meet me a handsome man who's got a
forlorn look on his face on a day like this, I just
might fall in love on the spot! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People used to say the most beautiful part of
winter is the early mornin'. Kinda poetic, ain't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I totally agree, though. It's cold in the mornin',
but then the sun comes peekin' out an' you just
get all energized and start workin' real hard.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Snowflakes flyin' in the sky, so fragile an'
beautiful...
<PAGE>
's only proper for it to snow in winter, don'tcha
think? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Heck of a storm, ain't it?
<PAGE>
You should head on home, 'fore it gets too bad.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I-I like snow an' all, but...I got my limits...
<PAGE>
You should head on home. We wouldn't want ya'
passin' out in the middle of nowhere, now.
NoMsg

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dessie ain't in at the moment.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Can't focus on my work without Dessie
around...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Every time Dessie fails at somethin', on come
the waterworks.
<PAGE>
Last time it happened, I told 'er to stop cryin'
and think about why she failed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But that just made 'er cry even more!
<PAGE>
Didn't mean to upset 'er none. I feel real bad...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Dessie's a bit slow, but she's got a warm heart,
an' she's pretty gosh-darned cute to boot. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...She can be a little frustratin' sometimes,
though.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This spring here's our home. The water's nice 'n
clear and we're surrounded by nature, so what's
not to like? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mora brought over a ton of mushrooms
yesterday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...but all of 'em were poison!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Shame 'e couldn't tell the edible ones from the
poison ones. I mean, he's a Nature Sprite, so
you'd think he could! You'd best be careful too.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I don't like insects, but butterflies are beautiful,
far as I'm concerned. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Always nice an' cool around the spring. ♪
...All I need for dinner tonight is water, I think.
That should do me just fine!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The tough part of my job is gettin' the
ingredients I need to cook every day...
<PAGE>
I have no trouble findin' 'em, though, since
there're mushrooms all over the place this time
of year. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Insects gather all 'round the spring every
night...an' it's scary! Makes it so I can't hardly
sleep well at all.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's rich nature all 'round here, but this 'ere is
the most beautiful spot of 'em all, I think. What
an amazing view...
<PAGE>
...Hmm? What's so amazing about it? Well, the
autumn leaves, of course! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*stare* *refocus* *turn*
<PAGE>
Hmm? What am I doin'? I'm lookin' for
chestnuts! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
You can sometimes find 'em out on the streets.
Though even if I don't pick 'em up, Mora will
find 'em and bring 'em back for sure.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Where I come from, nothin' says fall like Red-
Veined Darters.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Snow sure stacks up high 'round here.
<PAGE>
You ever got an ear-ache from the quiet when
there's lotsa snow on the ground?
<PAGE>
When people talk about a place bein' dead quiet,
I think that's what they mean.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was real little, I had snowball fights with
the other Nature Spirits.
<PAGE>
Ain't got time for that no more, though, now
that I'm takin' care of Dessie.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ahhh. Gotta love winter, the season of no
insects. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm out for a walk right now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Mora wouldn't stop buggin' me about what was
for dinner tonight...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...so I ran away from him for a little. Figured I'd
get in some "me" time.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sometimes I stumble across a Moondrop Flower
'r two along the path.
<PAGE>
Bet if I made a bouquet out of 'em, it'd be
gorgeous. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I like spring and everything about spring. Except
frogs. Can't stand frogs...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place is just boomin'. Pretty different from
what it's like 'round springtime.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The river makes the climate 'round these parts a
little more bearable than it would be otherwise.
<PAGE>
But it's still pretty scorchin'...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The Great Purple Emperor is the most beautiful
butterfly! An' I think its wings look pretty good
on me, if I do say so m'self. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, it took its sweet ol' time, but autumn's
finally here!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dessie's got a heck of an appetite in the fall of
each year, for some reason 'r another. Makes it
hard for me to get enough food sometimes!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Bugs, bugs... Can never get away from the
bugs, but I sure do wish I could!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Though don't get me wrong, it ain't like every
insect creeps me out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>There are some beautiful bugs out there too, like
fireflies and butterflies!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, cold enough to freeze a river? That's a cold
I don't wanna be part of!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you throw a snowball, sometimes -- on a real
rare occasion -- you might actually find
somethin' cool hidden inside it.
<PAGE>
Just...don't throw it at a person to find out, you
got that?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Frogs. I don't like 'em. So I avoid the river.
<PAGE>
But come winter, they're all gone an' I'm free to
spend as much time by the river as I want! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seems it's easier to grow fruit trees 'round here
than other places.
<PAGE>
Cherries are in season right now, ain't they?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
They say tea made from spring tea leaves is
good for ya'.
<PAGE>
I should prob'ly take some to Dessie.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Since there ain't a lotta insects around, I gotta
say this place is pretty relaxin'. But then out
pops a frog from nowhere, and all bets're off!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Summer is the time for fruit, don'tcha think?
Fruit's always sweetest in summertime.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mangooooooes! ♪
No better season for 'em than right now, y'
know?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Summer's great on account of all the fruits and
vegetables, but them bugs have gotta go!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the season to beat if you're lookin' for
apples, and grapes, and all kinds of other fruit
you can use to make sweet, sweet desserts!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If you harvest any fruit, would you share some
with me? Pretty pleeeeeeease? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Fruit is great an' all, but one thing that always
comes with it are nasty ol' bugs! Takes away
from the whole experience, if ya' ask me...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, got a secret for ya'...
<PAGE>
Sugar cane can be refined into sugar. Like, the
kind ya' use to sweeten your tea! Crazy, ain't it?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sugar is the lynchpin for makin' sweets. You
humans've got it made, what with all your crazy
spices...but sugar's easily the best of 'em all.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sure is cold! But the cold kills all the nasty ol'
bugs, so maybe winter ain't so bad after all! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tulips are my favorite flower. ♪
<PAGE>
They're elegant and so, so beautiful! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, what a beautiful flower garden! ♪
Everywhere I look, there're flowers to be
smelled...and that smell is heavenly! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can't sleep. Bees'll sting me.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Depending on the season, some roses'll grow
faster than others.
<PAGE>
During summer, red roses grow the fastest.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place looks jawdroppin', don't it? It's 'cause
it's full of flowers!
<PAGE>
Think I'm gonna make a flower wreath now, to
celebrate. Just...celebrate. Everything! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Summer's when all the fireflies come out, huh?
They're so beautiful an' elegant... They really
show what summer's all about, don't they?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Back in my home country, there're flowers called
pink carnations.
<PAGE>
People, uh...used to call me that. Pink
Carnation. I know it's...kinda stupid, but there ya'
have it! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They say perfume makes honey even honey-er!
<PAGE>
But I kinda feel like using perfume for BEES is
just...such a waste...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Insects might look tiny to humans like you.
<PAGE>
But for us, they're monsters! You can't even
imagine how big an' scary they look to us!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Honey can't be harvested in winter.
<PAGE>
I mean, even the bees can't go out in weather
like this, y' know? So how are we supposed to?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If blue roses really do exist...
<PAGE>
...I bet they look super-pretty when they bloom
in the snow... <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seemed odd to me that there ain't no noise
comin' from this hive box, but I guess it's 'cause
there ain't no bees in it...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Leafy veggies are a mystery wrapped in an
enigma...
<PAGE>
I mean, they're vegetables, but the leaves 're the
parts ya' eat! How weird is that?!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mint, chamomile and other herbs are all growin'
around here.
<PAGE>
It's like a treasure trove for me! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Butterflies fly and flowers bloom... What a
season! Spring goes vroom! Hee hee... ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I ate a pumpkin once. It was so sweet and
delicious...mmmmmm... <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
If you get any pumpkin seeds, you be sure an'
grow 'em, now, y'hear? ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! Y'ever heard of a sweet an' juicy
fruit called a "water-melon"?
<PAGE>
I ain't never had one before, but it just sounds so
gosh-darned good, I wanna give it a try!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The cicadas're the harbingers of summer, I think.
When ya' hear 'em, you know the season's begun
for real!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fall is the time of the yam! ♪
<PAGE>
I could eat yam every day an' be the happiest
Nature Sprite ya' ever did know! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lavender smells so good, don't it? Real pretty
color, too. I just love it!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why do men like to catch bugs? I just don't get
it!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The root vegetable that defines winter is the
good ol' radish, ain't it?
<PAGE>
We eat it a lot during winter, too. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since this place is so massive, snow makes it
glisten real pretty-like, don't it?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Humans are sure hard-workin' creatures, ain't
they? You guys start bright an' early, even in this
cold weather! We could learn a thing or two.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Paddies 're already mostly water, so ain't no
reason to water crops ya' got in 'em.
<PAGE>
But ya' still need to check on 'em regularly, so
don't forget, okay?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The grain to end all grains is wheat rice. You can
make flour from it.
<PAGE>
Must be convenient to grow, since you won't
hafta go to a store an' buy any.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fireflies must like things that sparkle, don'tcha
think? 'Cause...I know I sure like things that
sparkle! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So...if ya' wanna make a paddy, ya' just draw
water from the river, right?
<PAGE>
Sure does make these parts a lot cooler than the
rest of the area...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The other day, Mora fell into the river an' we had
to go pull 'im out.
<PAGE>
An' when we got to 'im, he was stuck inside a
rubber boot, of all things!
<PAGE>
Heh... I know I shouldn't laugh, but...
<PAGE>
You shoulda seen it! It was priceless! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When fireflies gather 'round the river, the river
looks like it's glowin'. It's quite a sight to see!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm out fishin', I sometimes catch weird
things.
<PAGE>
An' it ain't always pleasant. Makes it real clear
that people 're still throwin' trash in the water,
an' that ain't right!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If there's one crop that just screams "autumn" to
me, it's rice.
<PAGE>
My home country makes all kinds o' rice,
y'know! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When y'hear insects cryin' at night, don't it make
you feel a little sad?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if fish can feel the cold. Really makes
ya' think, don't it?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Among all the crops ya' can grow in paddies,
there's one in particular called "wasabi."
<PAGE>
It's known far an' wide for bein' just about the
spiciest thing on the planet. It's like, scary
spicy...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fireflies are real pretty when they're lit up, but
when they're not, don't ya' think they look
kinda...gross?

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm, what should I make for dinner...?
<PAGE>
There's so much food to choose from 'round
here, it's hard to decide what to cook...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's that? You say the way I speak is
kinda weird? Well, yeah, I ain't from around here,
after all. Stands to reason I'd speak different!
<PAGE>
This's the dialect of my hometown. I been tryin'
to talk like y'all, but ol' habits die hard, y'know?

Content.VardId: プレイヤーが渡した、見せたＭＳＧ
Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh? This for me?
<PAGE>
Ya' know I like sweets, but I gotta say, my
favorite of the bunch is the humble ol' 
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>. ♪
<PAGE>
It's so big, and looks scrumptious. Thank ya' so
much, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, is this for me? That's super nice of you!
♪
<PAGE>
I'll enjoy every single bite! Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, is this for me? Thank you, <MYNAME>! I
really do appreciate it! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Thanks!
<PAGE>
Huh? What's my favorite kinda food? Well, the
sweeter, the better! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Dunno what I'm gonna do with it,
but thanks anyway! Should be fun to figure out.
♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What you got there? ...Oh. I...don't much care
for spicy foods, y' know...
<PAGE>
I'll take it, though! I mean, ya' did bring it for me,
so I'd feel bad if I didn't. Maybe Gusto will enjoy
it...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa. Now, hold on just a minute, here!
<PAGE>
I don't like spicy food to begin with, but my
least favorite spicy food on the planet...well,
you're lookin' at it. <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>.
<PAGE>
I'll take it this time, but please don't bring it
'round here again if you can help it.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, this is real sparkly. Is it for me?
<PAGE>
It's beautiful! ♪
<PAGE>
I'll enjoy every last bite! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, this sure does twinkle!
<PAGE>
Huh? it's for me? Thank ya' very much,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this sure does twinkle!
<PAGE>
Huh? it's for me? Thank ya' very much,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this sure does twinkle. Is it for me?
<PAGE>
Dunno what I'm gonna do with it, but thanks!
Should be fun to think about. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa. That sparkles real pretty-like, but what is
it?
<PAGE>
I don't like spicy food...but I sure can't say no to
somethin' so twinkly! Not this time, anyway.
<PAGE>
I wonder if Gusto or someone else will eat it for
me...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa. That sparkles real pretty-like, but what is
it?
<PAGE>
I don't like spicy food...but I sure can't say no to
somethin' so twinkly! Not this time, anyway.
<PAGE>
I wonder if Gusto or someone else will eat it for
me...

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Didn't ya' just gave me another present a
little while ago?
<PAGE>
I'd feel bad receivin' so many gifts from you.
Please, keep it.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, hello there, bunnykins!
<PAGE>
I like to play with the rabbits in the forest
whenever I got time. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? I ain't seen you before, have I? Nice
meetin' ya'!
<PAGE>
...What, you surprised I can tell one fox apart
from the others? Course I can! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, hello there, ermine buddy!
<PAGE>
This ermine gives me rides on its back all the
time. <RED>∀</RED> Thanks for always bein' so nice to me,
big guy! ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, fancy meetin' you here. You come 'round a
lot these days, don'tcha? Nice seein' ya'!
<PAGE>
Always remember, the animals in the forest are
our friends. Every one of 'em!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You givin' me a flower? Oh, today's that
fair, ain't it?
<PAGE>
Givin' a flower to people you care about is a real
sweet tradition. Thank you. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard you humans present blue feathers when
you're gettin' married.
<PAGE>
So since you got one, does that mean you're
marryin' someone soon yourself?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That's so great! Good for you! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's quite a ring! You givin' it to someone?
You should keep it somewhere safe so you don't
drop it. ♪

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, this is beautifully wrapped! And it's my
favorite color. ♪ Thanks so much, <MYNAME>!
<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, this is beautifully wrapped! Thanks so
much, <MYNAME>. <RED>∀</RED>
NoMsg

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, <MYNAME>, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
Today's your birthday, ain't it? Yeah, I
remembered...an' I brought you a present! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
It's nothin' too special, but I hope you like it!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, today's your birthday, ain't it?
Happy birthday! ♪

Content.VardId: 会話間隔が空いていたＭＳＧ
Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Who are you?
<PAGE>
Since we ain't talked much, I forgot you even
existed. ♪
NoMsg

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*yawn* 'Bout time to be gettin' to bed, don'tcha
think?
